title: My Client is so screwed up right now
body: I tried to play league today but when ever I try to log in it takes like 5 mins after I type in my information to log in. When I look for a match or try to do anything my client just freezes or doesn't listen when I tell it to go to the store or lock in a champ. Is anyone else having this issue because I checked my wifi and it's clearly okay?

replies.body: That sounds like it might be caused by a slower or unstable connection with our servers, which might just be because of how your ISP is routing your connection but there's also a pretty good chance that adjusting some [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) could help speed things up. Run through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if that's able to help at all.
